mapper.select: SELECT iaddress, addr_nm, user_nm, post, addr, addr_detail, phone, isrep FROM t_address WHERE iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY isrep DESC, iaddress
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_address (iuser, post, addr, addr_detail, phone, addr_nm, user_nm, isrep) VALUES (#{iuser}, #{post}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail}, #{phone}, #{addr_nm}, #{user_nm}, #{isrep})
